MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Doddington, Bridgemere, Walgherton and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:16 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a snapped electricity pole and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:13 pm on 23rd February, 2021.
